name: unwatchable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unwatchable TV programme, film, etc. is so violent, bad, boring, or unpleasant that it is impossible to watch. : This mostly unfunny and frequently unwatchable sitcom made its debut last month. I thought it was so pretentious and self-indulgent that it was virtually unwatchable.
More examplesFewer examplesThe final part of the documentary, which features clips of survivors, is almost unwatchable.A weak year for TV, it brought us unwatchable garbage like this series.The third season was so inconsistent and strident that it was nearly unwatchable.
